body_content.explanation: a device with two parts that open and close on the end, used for taking hold of or picking up things:
examples: I added a metal pot grabber to my kit to grab and lift cans and metal pots off the fire.
The probe has a tiny, alligator-jawed grabber .

body_content.explanation: someone who takes an opportunity to get, use, or enjoy something quickly:
examples: They've locked up a lot of illegal loggers and land grabbers who burn land.
In every era the power grabbers promise safety from what people most fear.

body_content.explanation: something or someone who makes you pay attention:
examples: The title itself is quite a grabber.
The opening work was the evening's real attention grabber .
The six Mitford sisters were headline grabbers in the 1930's and 40's.
